about.text: The best and most interesting things are created thanks to unusual connections. Specialization can give us accuracy. Specialization combined with interdisciplinary can ensure precision and creativity. I am an artist with an analytical mind. When I do something - I try to do it the best I can. Musical education and work in this profession have taught me to be scrupulous: I am creative, but also precise. I create websites, I play the bassoon, I am a bassoon school teacher - in all these aspects I strive for perfection.

skills.text: By creating a website I use different programming languages and tools:
